page.title: 18RELIGION
page.content: {Kenton Church The Church was founded by St Petherick around 560 when he travelled through Devon.The tower which can be seen from the surrounding countryside is 120 feet high.The famous Rod Screen is a gift from Bishop Peter Courtney in 1478. Many people visit Kenton just to see this. {Lumley Cross- }Given by Lord Mamhead in memory to his sister and kept in Exeter Cathederal.It was stolen and found in a hedge without it's jewels. The silver cross was from then on kept in Kenton church.Lord Mamhead had a smaller gold replica made with jewels,which was kept in his bedroom until he died.It is now kept in the church.
